title: The WeHead GPT Edition – Your $5,000 ChatGPT Encounter
description: In the ever-evolving landscape of AI technology, WeHead has taken a bold step with the introduction of the WeHead GPT Edition. Priced at a staggering $5,000, this AI assistant aims to bridge the gap between humans and artificial intelligence by providing a physical face for users to engage with. The ambitious project raises intriguing questions […]

title: AI Adoption – Chief Justice Roberts’ Cautionary Outlook for the Legal System
description: In a pivotal report released on Sunday, U.S. Supreme Court Justice John Roberts sounded a cautionary note on the adoption of artificial intelligence (AI) within the legal landscape. Emphasizing “caution and humility,” Roberts acknowledged the transformative potential of AI in increasing access to justice and expediting legal processes but warned against its inherent risks. The […]
